media:group.media:title: Populism, Explained Simply
media:group.media:description:
A simple explanation of populism.

If you want to support the channel, here are the best ways to do it:

1) Watch the full video
2) Subscribe if you haven't
3) Share with a friend
4) Support me with a small donation on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/rchapman 

0:00 Intro
0:32 What Is Populism?
11:14 Tendencies Of Populism
13:49 Is Populism Dangerous?
16:07 Outro

Sources:

What Is Populism? - Jan-Werner Müller
The Oxford Handbook Of Populism - C. Kaltwasser, P. Taggart, P. Espejo & P. Ostiguy
Anti-Pluralism - William A. Galston 
Us Vs. Them - Ian Bremmer

Theme music: Double Soul - Unfinished Sympathy
